id: scenario-autonomous-entity-customer-scenarios-community-customer participates in neighborhood celebration of democratic achievements
title: Customer participates in neighborhood celebration of democratic achievements
description: Customer participates in neighborhood celebration of democratic achievements
content:
Scenario: Customer participates in neighborhood celebration of democratic achievements
    Given economic development typically celebrates corporate recruitment
    And democratic conversions deserve community recognition
    When neighborhood celebrates democratic business milestones
    Then Ms. Johnson attends public celebrations of worker ownership conversions
    And community honors workers' ownership and business founders' choices
    And celebrations build collective pride and solidarity
    And democratic culture strengthens through community recognition
    And community_elohim coordinates celebration events amplifying democratic achievements
